items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: A lightweight React-based calendar app that uses FullCalendar to display and manage events. Users can add events by clicking on a date, and all events are fetched from a backend API. Currently, the app uses a hardcoded user ID for demonstration.
items.title: nagasaipurvaz/simple-calender-app: A lightweight React-based calendar app that uses FullCalendar to display and manage events. Users can add events by clicking on a date, and all events are fetched from a backend API. Currently, the app uses a hardcoded user ID for demonstration.
